numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Legacy applicants are more likely to be accepted than non-legacy applicants.
2. Rich legacy applicants have a higher admission rate than non-rich legacy applicants.
3. Rich legacy applicants have a higher admission rate than non-legacy applicants.
4. I wonder why legacy applicants have higher admission rates than non-legacy applicants.
5. I am a high school student.
6. I think about colleges a lot.
7. I try to do what I can to get accepted to my college of choice.
8. I wonder how much not being a legacy applicant will affect my chances of admission.
9. I hope that the college remembers your older siblings.
